import {
  Meta,
  Story,
  Props,
  Preview,
  Subtitle,
} from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
// This isn't documented anywhere, but look into storybook docs exports: https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/blob/master/addons/docs/src/blocks/index.ts

import { Grid } from './Grid';
import { Box } from '../Box';

<Meta title="Components/Grid" component={Grid} />

# Grid

<Subtitle>
  The Grid component easily applies Grid layouts and supports grid, space, layout,
  flexbox, border, position, and color styled props from styled-system.
</Subtitle>

<Preview withToolbar withSource="open">
  <Story name="Base">
      <Grid
        gridTemplateColumns={'1fr 2fr'}
        gridColumnGap={3}
        mb={2}
        sx={{
          padding: 3,
          bg: 'primary',
        }}>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>1fr</code></Box>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>2fr</code></Box>
      </Grid>
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview withToolbar withSource="open">
  <Story name="With responsive columns">
      <Grid
        gridTemplateColumns={['1fr 2fr', '1fr 1fr']}
        gridColumnGap={3}
        sx={{
          padding: 3,
          bg: 'primary',
        }}>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>[1fr, 1fr]</code></Box>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>[2fr, 2fr]</code></Box>
      </Grid>
  </Story>
</Preview>

<Preview withToolbar withSource="open">
  <Story name="With CSS grid functions">
      <Grid
        gridTemplateColumns={['repeat(auto-fit, minmax(192px, 1fr))']}
        gridColumnGap={3}
        sx={{
          padding: 3,
          bg: 'primary',
        }}>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>auto-fix, minmax(192px, 1fr)</code></Box>
        <Box p={2} bg={'background'}><code>auto-fix, minmax(192px, 1fr)</code></Box>
      </Grid>
  </Story>
</Preview>
